subscription.question: What is included in the subscription?
subscription.answer: Our subscription includes access to premium content, support, and exclusive offers.

cancellationPolicy.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellationPolicy.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalty.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

customerSupport.question: How can I contact customer support?
customerSupport.answer: You can reach our customer support team via email or live chat on our website.
